00133 INLINE void lcd_32122a_hw_bus_init(void)
00134 {
00135     cpu_flags_t flags;
00136     IRQ_SAVE_DISABLE(flags);
00137 
00138     /*
00139      * Here set bus pin!
00140      * to init a lcd device.
00141      *
00142      */
00143 
00144     /*
00145      * Data bus is in output state most of the time:
00146      * LCD r/w functions assume it is left in output state
00147      */
00148     LCD_DB_OUT;
00149 
00150 
00151     IRQ_RESTORE(flags);
00152 }
